MobileDeviceAppRegistration.name: MobileDeviceAppRegistration
MobileDeviceAppRegistration.description: Represents the details provided in a mobile device registration event from an app that uses the Engagement Mobile SDK.

DatetimeInDevice.description: The date and time of the registration event, based on values provided by the device.

DeviceModel.description: The model of the device that’s being registered, such as iPhone 17 or Google Pixel.

DevicePlatform.description: The operating system of the mobile device, such as iPhone OS or Android.

DeviceSystemToken.description: A unique token that represents the mobile device. The push notification service (such as Apple Push Notification service or Firebase Cloud Messaging) uses this token to deliver messages to the device.

DeviceSystemTokenHash.description: A hash of the device token.

DeviceTimezone.description: The time zone that the device is located in when the registration event occurs.

DeviceVersion.description: The version or model number of the device.

Deviceid.description: A unique identifier for the mobile device.

Eventid.description: A unique identifier for the registration event.

IsBackgroundRefreshEnabled.description: Indicates whether the device gives permission for the app to receive updates while it’s in the background.

IsBluetoothEnabled.description: Indicates whether Bluetooth is enabled on the device.

IsDst.description: Indicates whether the device’s locale observes daylight saving time (DST).

IsLocationEnabled.description: Indicates whether the device has location services enabled for the app.

IsPushEnabled.description: Indicates whether the device has push notifications enabled for the app.

Locale.description: The locale string for the device, such as en_US or ja_JP.

MobileAppName.description: The name of the mobile app, as configured in Setup.

MobileAppVersion.description: The version number of the mobile app that generated the registration event.

MobileAppid.description: A unique ID that represents the mobile app.

PartyIdentificationName.description: The name of the party identifier for identity resolution rules.

PartyIdentificationNumber.description: The ID used for identity resolution comparisons.

PartyIdentificationType.description: A string that provides additional information about the type of party identifier used, such as Driver License or SSN.

RegistrationDatetime.description: The date and time when the registration event occurred.

Registrationid.description: A unique ID for the registration event.

SdkVersion.description: The version of the Mobile Engagement SDK that the app uses.
